description:
One day, Miyako got a love letter for the first time in her life. The sender was a classmate of hers- the timid boy from her class. Curious about her first love letter and having a boyfriend, she started falling in love with him. 

However, he was a little… “sick”.

She was naive. She didn’t know that their sweet affectionate time will pass by soon.>
